extendedInfo.description: Like our facebook page!https://www.facebook.com/DataWizAppTake control of your mobile data usage and stay under your budget with DataMiâs application and data usage tracker, DataWiz...To save money on your mobile data bill, the app precisely monitors your mobile deviceâs usage AND predicts future usage. This innovative technology, developed by the great minds at DataMi, an early-stage startup company spun out of Princeton University, empowers you to take control of your mobile data plan and keep expenses within your budget. With a cool, user-friendly interface, easy-to-understand graphs, data usage quota caps, and regular alerts, youâll never go over your mobile data allowance again!Features:SLEEK, INTUITIVE INTERFACE: With a clean, clear, and simple interface, DataWiz is easy to set up and use.VIEW PAST USAGE: Review your cellular and WiFi usage history by the hour or the dayTRACK CURRENT DATA USAGE WITH PRECISION: DataWiz measures cellular and wifi data in real-time, so you always know exactly how much you useLOCATION-BASED TRACKING: Recorded data is linked with GPS information and, if WiFi, Network name. Easy to read maps show where data is used.USAGE HISTORY GRAPHS: Swipeable usage history graphs give a clear and quick visual overview of your current and future data usage. Swipe between days, weeks, or months.NOTIFICATIONS/ALERTS: By setting caps on data usage, DataWiz will alert you when those limits are reached so you donât exceed your data allowance.OPTIMIZE YOUR DATA PLAN: By identifying trends in data usage, you can choose a better data plan that fits your needs/budget.SMART DESIGN: DataWiz delivers its tracking information via two complex algorithms: The first is used to recommend the daily cap by taking into account previous usage and the remaining balance, and the second algorithm calculates the expected budget for the rest of the billing cycle.INNOVATIVE ENGINEERING: Motivated by the elimination of unlimited data plans by wireless service providers, DataMi has been founded with the goal to bridge the gap between consumers and providers. It does so by incentivizing both sides to make wireless data accessible and affordable to all.UNDERSTAND YOUR DATA USAGE! In addition to tracking the amount of data usage, DataWiz educates users on the types of downloads and streaming that use the most bandwidth. With the inevitable disappearance of unlimited pricing plans, the ability to understand and precisely track your data usage with DataWiz is essential!The app is free and without ads.

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: works great as a data monitor for ginger bread 2.3.4...really like the cell tower locations kept in memory on map..cool app..thank you very much..went thru alot of data usage apps..quite accurate.
reviews.author: Alan Zimerman

reviews.title: Can\'t Save Settings
reviews.comment: This is a very useful and simple app and works as advertised.    However, I\'m unable to save my settings which instruct the app my monthly data allotment as well as my billing cycle.   If the developers release an update to fix this issue I would give this app a 5-star rating.
reviews.author: GARRAN CHUN

reviews.title: Does not save settings
reviews.comment: I could not get it to save the settings
reviews.author: James Prescott

reviews.title: Bad Update
reviews.comment: After the update, start crashing in my s3 with JB
reviews.author: Angelica Rosario

reviews.title: Useful application for daily use
reviews.comment: I use datawiz every day to track my data usage.  Additionally, the application can show unusual traffic patterns to enforce application security.  The GUI design is intuitive and clean.  Automatic downloading of operator price plan would be a useful feature to add.  I also like the map plot of where and how much data are used.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful but no export feature
reviews.comment: I downloaded the application in order to export data for princeton grand challenge homework but there is no export option in settings

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Quite buggy on HTC desire HD... Slow and not responsive ...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: I particularly like the map feature - it shows a map plot of where data usage occurred.   Phone - Nexus One
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Working great
reviews.comment: Mo and Saaketh did a great job and everything works as expected.
reviews.author: SANGTAE HA

reviews.title: Bad Update
reviews.comment: Won\'t run on my RAZR HD.  Previous version worked fine...
reviews.author: Richard Tasker

reviews.title: QUESTION
reviews.comment: Do you have to keep this app running in the background in order to have it track your usage?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fancy job!
reviews.comment: It comes with a great UI.  Good enough to show where you use the data and makes data planning much easier.
reviews.author: A Google User
